instructions: In a large nonstick skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Add the turkey, water, ketchup, vinegar, sugar, Worcestershire sauce, mustard and paprika. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes or until sauce is thickened. Serve on rolls.
ingredients: 1/4 cup red wine vinegar or cider vinegar
title: Barbecued Turkey Sandwiches
